App Widget, closes #64

Fixing the MissingTranslation Lint errors

The errors will still be shown as warnings, but lint won't fail anymore

Using dp instead of sp for text sizes.

When setting text sizes, you should normally use sp, or 'scale-independent pixels'. This is like the dp unit, but it is also scaled by the user's font size preference. It is recommend you use this unit when specifying font sizes, so they will be adjusted for both the screen density and the user's preference.

Use sshj4android (moves sshj version to 0.11.0)
SSH module no longer needs to be an android library.
Delete unused drawables.
sshj4android is available on jcenter
Fix log when keyfile is not found.

New non-prompting placeholders for custom commands.

Available are:
- %{pi.name}, %{pi.host}, %{pi.user}, ... (all getters of RaspberryDeviceBean which are annotated with @Exported).
- %{date(<a_date_format>)} where <a_date_format> is a date format according to Java's SimpleDateFormat, e.g. %{date(dd-MM-yyyy)} will be replaced with 01-04-2015
